ARV.NZ.summary: Arvida Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns, develops, and operates retirement villages and care facilities for the elderly in New Zealand. As of March 31, 2020, it operated approximately 32 retirement villages with 1,688 aged care beds and 2,475 retirement units. The company was formerly known as Hercules Limited. Arvida Group Limited was founded in 2014 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

RH7.F.summary: Ryman Healthcare Limited develops, owns, and operates integrated retirement villages, rest homes, and hospitals for the elderly in New Zealand and Australia. Its villages offer a range of retirement living and care options, such as independent townhouses and apartments, and serviced apartments, as well as a care center, which provides rest homes, hospitals, dementia level care, and respite and day care services. The company's villages also offer lounges and bar, indoor swimming pool and spa, gym, beauty salon, bowling green, library, internet cafÃ©, movie theatre, and other facilities. Ryman Healthcare Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Christchurch, New Zealand.

SNZ.AX.summary: Summerset Group Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, owns, and operates integrated retirement villages in New Zealand. It provides various independent living options, including villas, townhouses, apartments, serviced apartments, and care centre. The company also offers one-off, supported living, premium care, rest home care, hospital care, memory care, and respite and short term care services. It develops and operates 31 retirement villages; and provides living options and care services to approximately 5,500 residents. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Wellington, New Zealand. Summerset Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of New Zealand Central Securities Depository Limited.
